alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN CAMDEN...CENTRAL PASQUOTANK...AND NORTHWESTERN CURRITUCK COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF CHESAPEAKE... At 1159 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Camden, moving north at 30 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy downpours are possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Elizabeth City, Camden, South Mills, Chesapeake, Fentress, Northwest, Morgans Corner, Belcross, Burnt Mills, Horseshoe, Pierceville, Tar Corner, Gregory, Sharon, Spences Corner, Lilly, Lambs Corner, Johnsons Corner, Hickory and Chesapeake Airport. Frequent lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
